segments.text: Good evening , sir . Are you Mr Jim Stewart from the States ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Glad to meet you , Mr Stewart . I'm the guide from Pacific Tour Agency . My name is Zhang Hua .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hello , I was just looking for the guide .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm always at your service , sir . By the way , did you have a pleasant trip ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Not bad . But I've made too many flights these days . I could hardly remember how many take-offs and landings I've been through these three days . I think we all feel a bit tired .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , shall we go to the hotel right now ? I've already made a reservation for you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Wonderful . I'm eager to take a sauna as soon as possible .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: So we must get you to the hotel as soon as possible . I hope to see you refreshed and revitalized tomorrow morning , as we are going to visit the Great Wall .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I am sure we will . Actually , we are looking forward to seeing the great wonder .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Come this way , please . The coach is waiting outside .
segments.speaker: S1
